name: Charlotte Linlin
text: On Play: Your opponent chooses 1 of the following effects: • Trash 1 Life card from the top card of your opponent's Life area. • Put 1 card from the top of your deck on top of your Life area.

effect.text: Your opponent chooses 1 of the following effects: Trash 1 Life card from the top card of your opponent's Life area OR Put 1 card from the top of your deck on top of your Life area.
